AST-based Expression Evaluation System

Source: R/ast.R
AST.Rd

This module provides an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) based system for improved expression evaluation in survey data processing. It offers better performance, dependency tracking, and optimization capabilities compared to standard evaluation methods.

Details

The AST system provides:

  • Static analysis of expressions before execution

  • Dependency detection for variable relationships

  • Expression optimization and caching

  • Better error reporting with precise locations

  • Support for complex nested expressions

Developed by Mauro Loprete, Natalia da Silva.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.3.
